metadata.title: CVE-2024-50287 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: v4l2-tpg: prevent the risk of a division by zeroAs reported by Coverity, the logic at tpg_precalculate_line()blindly rescales the buffer even when scaled_witdh is equal tozero. If this ever happens, this will cause a division by zero.Instead, add a WARN_ON_ONCE() to trigger such cases and returnwithout doing any precalculation.
